sentences.en: " The theme of the conference is: " New Millennium, New Education, New Communication and New Cooperation. "
sentences.cn: 本次大会的主题: 新千年 、 新教育 、 新交流、新合作.

sentences.en: Acupuncture was practised in China as long ago as the third millennium BC.
sentences.cn: 中国早在公元前3,000年就已开始采用针灸疗法。

sentences.en: All time , he might have added, is the millennium of their glory.
sentences.cn: 也许他还应该加上一句:“千秋万代功名永在”.

sentences.en: Current indications suggest a 4 th millennium BC date for this initial phase.
sentences.cn: 从现有资料推算,这个最初阶段可能在公元前4000年开始.

sentences.en: Did your men deactivate the hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon?
sentences.cn: 你的人是否把千年鹰号的超光速器给破坏了?

sentences.en: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?
sentences.cn: 快船 ﹖ 你们没听过千年鹰 吗 !

sentences.en: He could be proclaimed a saint by the turn of the Millennium.
sentences.cn: 他可能会在千禧年之交被正式宣布为圣徒.

sentences.en: He lived long enough to see in the new millennium.
In the Millennium dressing - room at half - time, Rafa made his usual inspirational speech.
sentences.cn: 中场休息时, 拉法在千年球场的更衣室做了他一贯的鼓舞人心的讲话.

sentences.en: Millennium Park has and places for music, dance and ice skating.
sentences.cn: 千僖公园有供大家唱歌, 跳舞,滑冰的场地.

sentences.en: Millennium Park has gardens and places for music, dance and ice skating.
sentences.cn: 千禧公园里有花园和听音乐 、 跳舞、溜冰的场所.

sentences.en: Millennium would be more complex than anything ever built.
sentences.cn: 千禧塔比其它建筑都要复杂.

sentences.en: people who have inhabited this land for millennia
sentences.cn: 在这片土地上已经居住了数千年的人们

sentences.en: Such concessions are known from the second millennium B.C.
sentences.cn: 这种特许自公元前2000年即有所闻.

sentences.en: The whole world was counting down to the new millennium.
sentences.cn: 全世界都在倒计时迎接新千年的到来.

sentences.en: We waited as the clock ticked away the last few seconds of the old millennium.
sentences.cn: 我们静候着时钟滴答走过千年的最后几秒钟.

words.tran_cn: 千禧年信徒；相信太平盛事的人
千年期，千禧年；一千年，千年纪念；太平盛世，黄金时代

phrases.tran_cn: 千年发展目标（millennium development goal的复数）
